studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Updated safety profile to include cerebrovascular accidents and aligned with current Investigator's Brochure.
Increased frequency of vital sign monitoring (pulse and blood pressure) at every visit.
Halted collection of MRD samples for subjects already in Complete Response.
Added specific dose modification guidelines for subjects with chronic hepatic impairment based on Child-Pugh scores.
Added a second interim analysis at 180 PFS events and adjusted alpha spending.

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: To align with the ibrutinib Investigatorâ€™s Brochure regarding new safety observations of cerebrovascular accidents.
Stopping collection for current CR subjects has no impact on MRD-negative rate endpoint as samples are already secured.
To allow DMC recommendations for treatment unblinding or stopping placebo following interim analysis results.
Mitigate potential long interval between first interim and final analysis due to lower than expected event rate.

studyChanges.afterText: Updated safety information including cerebrovascular accidents from post-marketing setting
studyChanges.summary: Safety update to align with Investigator's Brochure.

studyChanges.beforeText: Any hemorrhagic event that is Grade 3 or greater in severity or results in loss of vision, transfusion, or hospitalization.
studyChanges.afterText: Any Grade 3+ hemorrhagic event; any serious bleeding event of any grade; any CNS hemorrhage/hematoma of any grade.
studyChanges.summary: Broadened the definition of Major Hemorrhage.

studyChanges.beforeText: Hematology values must be within limits within 14 days prior to randomization
studyChanges.afterText: Hematology values must be within the following limits:
studyChanges.summary: Removed the specific 14-day timeframe for screening laboratory parameters.

studyChanges.afterText: If a dose is missed, it can be taken as soon as possible on the same day with a return to normal schedule the next day.
studyChanges.summary: Updated missed dose instructions for consistency with product label.

studyChanges.afterText: Added instructions for dose modification of ibrutinib/placebo in subjects with chronic hepatic impairment based on Child-Pugh class A, B, or C.
